CustomField.description: Measures BL forecast accuracy by comparing Q1 2026 Commit Snapshot against actual outcome. 100% = closed at/above commit, 0% = committed but didn't close, NULL = not committed.
CustomField.formula: IF( Q1_2026_Commit_Snapshot__c > 0, IF( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Stage 6. Closed(Won)"), MIN(ACV__c / Q1_2026_Commit_Snapshot__c, 1), IF( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Stage 6. Closed(Won)")), OR(IsClosed, CloseDate <= DATE(2026, 4, 30)) ), 0, NULL ) ), NULL )
CustomField.label: Q1 2026 Commit Accuracy
